Package chat

Class ChatImpl

java.lang.Object
chat.ChatImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Chat, java.rmi.Remote
public class ChatImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Chat

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ChatImpl()
    Constructor Initialize all arguments and get history of server from "history.txt".

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void exit()
    "/exit" command on server will shut it down properly and save all current message history in "history.txt"
    boolean leave​(java.lang.String login)
    Just removing designed client from listeClient.
    boolean login​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String cl)
    When client log to the server with a "/login Itsme" the server get the remote object of the client and put it in listeClient.
    boolean sendmessage​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String login)
    sendmessage(String msg, String login) save the string msg send by client designed by login in the chat ArrayList Call getMessage method on all registered clients.
    boolean whisper​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String login)
    call method getWhisper on specified Client designed by login String.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public ChatImpl() throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor Initialize all arguments and get history of server from "history.txt".

  • Method Details

    • sendmessage

      public boolean sendmessage​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String login) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      sendmessage(String msg, String login) save the string msg send by client designed by login in the chat ArrayList Call getMessage method on all registered clients.
      Specified by:
      sendmessage in interface Chat
      Parameters:
      msg - String with wanted message.
      login - String with login of sender.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • whisper

      public boolean whisper​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String login) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      call method getWhisper on specified Client designed by login String.
      Specified by:
      whisper in interface Chat
      Parameters:
      msg - String with wanted message.
      login - String with login of the client you want to whisper.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • login

      public boolean login​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String cl) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      When client log to the server with a "/login Itsme" the server get the remote object of the client and put it in listeClient.
      Specified by:
      login in interface Chat
      Parameters:
      login - String of login of the new client.
      cl - String of the name of Service of the new client registered on the rmiregistry.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • leave

      public boolean leave​(java.lang.String login) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Just removing designed client from listeClient.
      Specified by:
      leave in interface Chat
      Parameters:
      login - String of login of client you wants to logout of server.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • exit

      public void exit() throws java.io.IOException
      "/exit" command on server will shut it down properly and save all current message history in "history.txt"
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
